doc.name: TaskFrame
doc.description: As described in ptolemy.apps.hardrealtime.MultiFrameTask, a multiframe task rotates through a set of different job specifications. A task frame describes one of those possible job specifications.
doc.author: Christos Stergiou
doc.property: The relative deadline of jobs released by the task frame.
The execution requirement of jobs released by the task frame.
Whether the task frame is the initial frame in the multi-frame task.
